channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Following Rockstar Games laying off 31 GTA 6 developers, even the UK Prime Minister Sir Kier Starmer is interested now and says that Parliament will investigate the matter — 'It's a deeply concerning case'
item.description: UK Prime Minister Sir Kier Starmer has said that the UK Parliament will investigate union-busting allegations against Rockstar Games after the studio fired 31 Grand Theft Auto 6 developers in October.

item.title: Noté 9/10, le récent bracelet Xiaomi Smart Band 10 est déjà à -25 % sur Amazon
item.description: Accessible, précis dans ses mesures et élégant, le récent Xiaomi Smart Band 10 occupe actuellement la première place dans notre classement des meilleurs bracelets connectés du moment. Et avec un prix qui passe de 49,99 euros à 37,99 euros sur Amazon, on peut dire qu'il mérite encore plus son statut de numéro 1.

item.title: « Un bénévole en Afrique » : nous avons testé 5 IA, le résultat est gênant
item.description: Accusé de préférence de couleur, Nano Banana Pro est-il le seule générateur d'images à favoriser des personnes blanches ?

item.title: Hannibal creator Bryan Fuller wanted his first film to be horror for everyone
item.description: When Bryan Fuller set out to make his first feature film, his goal was to make the kind of family-friendly scares that he loved as a kid. Think Gremlins or Ghostbusters. The creator of Hannibal and Pushing Daisies ended up crafting a story called Dust Bunny, about a young girl named Aurora who hires a […]

item.title: Protect your business data! Get LastPass for up to 50% off
item.description: TechRadar US readers can now get up to 50% off LastPass plans - ideal for small and medium-sized businesses

item.title: Need a last-minute gift? Walmart has a massive sale with deals from Apple, Ninja, Shark, Lego, and more
item.description: Walmart has a massive weekend holiday sale on best-selling gifts, and I'm rounding up the 25 best, including AirPods, coffee makers, Lego, and more.

item.title: Trump’s AI executive order promises ‘one rulebook.’ Startups may get legal limbo instead.
item.description: Trump signed an AI executive order targeting state laws and promising one national rulebook. Critics warn it could trigger court battles and prolong uncertainty for startups while Congress debates federal rules.

item.title: HBO Max’s new channels keep Friends and Game of Thrones playing 24/7
item.description: HBO Max is launching curated channels, a new feature that will allow you to quickly jump into a continuous feed of a popular series or tune into a specific genre. When you select a channel on HBO Max, the streaming service will start you at the beginning of whatever's playing, while giving you the ability […]

item.title: Test de la ROG Xbox Ally : le Steam Deck à la sauce Gamepass
item.description: Derrière la ROG Xbox Ally X se cache la ROG Xbox Ally toute blanche, plus accessible mais aussi moins puissante. Une machine qui ne manque pas d'intérêt, bien qu'elle soit focalisée sur un profil type de joueurs.

item.title: This Group Pays Bounties to Repair Broken Devices—Even if the Fix Breaks the Law
item.description: Fulu sets repair bounties on consumer products that employ sneaky features that limit user control. Just this week, it awarded more than $10,000 to the person who hacked the Molekule air purifier.

item.title: The Top 42 Moments From Sci-Fi, Fantasy, and Horror TV in 2025
item.description: io9 watched a ton of TV this year—and standout scenes, shocking reveals, and sometimes entire episodes from 'Andor,' 'Dan Da Dan,' 'Pluribus,' 'Severance,' and beyond are lingering in our minds.

item.title: Google Translate now lets you hear real-time translations in your headphones
item.description: The real-time headphone translations experience keeps each speaker’s tone, emphasis, and cadence intact, so it’s easier to follow the conversation and tell who’s saying what.

item.title: Voici le meilleur drone de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025

item.title: Hundreds of Climate Migrants Arrive in Australia, Leaving Their Sinking Island Home Behind
item.description: This year, thousands of Tuvaluans applied for Australia’s climate-migration visas to escape the impacts of rising sea levels.

item.title: Retro, a photo sharing app for friends, lets you ‘time-travel’ through your Camera Roll
item.description: Retro's new feature, Rewind, let you look back at your photo memories and scroll through them with a dial.

item.title: Doom studio id Software forms 'wall-to-wall' union, with 165 employees voting in favor
item.description: Id Software, the company behind Doom, has voted in favor of forming a "wall-to-wall" union. The term "wall-to-wall" refers to a union that includes every employee, regardless of duties. The vote wasn't unanimous, with 165 of 185 total employees in favor of the union. The union will work in conjunction with the Communications Workers of America (CWA), which is the same organization involved with parent company ZeniMax's recent unionization efforts. Microsoft, who owns ZeniMax, has already recognized this new effort, according to a statement by the CWA. It agreed to a labor neutrality agreement ...

item.title: Quel est le meilleur aspirateur robot à acheter en 2025 ? Notre guide d’achat complet
item.description: Vous êtes à la recherche d'un bon aspirateur robot pour vous simplifier la vie? Voici notre sélection des meilleurs robots aspirateurs, tous testés et approuvés.

item.title: The TCL QM9K is an excellent flagship TV, but I’m not sure who it’s for
item.description: TCL has been a solid competitor in the midrange TV market for years, going head-to-head with Hisense. Not only are TVs from both manufacturers competitive on features, they even use similar nomenclature to categorize their TV lines - the TCL QM8 and Hisense U8, QM7 and U7, and QM6 and U6. But with TCL's new […]

item.title: Home Depot exposed access to internal systems for a year, says researcher
item.description: A security researcher tried to alert Home Depot to the security lapse exposing its back-end GitHub source code repos and other internal cloud systems, but was ignored.

item.title: T-Mobile's epic iPhone 17 deal from Black Friday is still available - get four devices for free without a trade
item.description: Don't miss your chance to score four whole iPhone 17s for free at T-Mobile this week.

item.title: Nakamura E-Summit 940 LTD : le VTT électrique des randonneurs perd 600 € pour les fêtes
item.description: Ce sont les adeptes d'excursions en forêt, ou simplement celles et ceux qui recherchent un vélo électrique performant pour aller au travail, qui seront servis. Intersport propose en effet le puissant et endurant VTTAE Nakamura E-Summit 940 LTD à 1 299,99 euros au lieu de 1 899,99 euros.

item.title: Why AI errors are inevitable and what that means healthcare
item.description: Health care datasets have significant overlaps that would prevent AI from being error-free. In the past decade, AI’s success has led to uncurbed enthusiasm and bold claims—even though users frequently experience errors that AI makes. An AI-powered digital assistant can misunderstand someone’s speech in embarrassing ways, a chatbot could hallucinate facts, or, as I experienced, an AI-based navigation tool might even guide drivers through a corn field—all without registering the errors....

item.title: Get the Mashable favorite Eufy X10 Pro Omni for nearly half off at Amazon
item.description: As of Dec. 12, get the Eufy X10 Pro Omni robot vacuum and mop for 45% off at Amazon.

item.title: Bug de l’an 2038 : pourquoi le RER A et le métro parisien risquent le black-out
item.description: Une bombe à retardement numérique menace les transports parisiens. La justice vient de condamner Alstom à corriger un bug critique qui pourrait paralyser le RER A et plusieurs lignes de métro dès janvier 2038.

item.title: U.S. Mint reveals coin designs commemorating 250th anniversary of America’s independence
item.description: Designs for the quarter include depictions of the Mayflower Compact, U.S. Constitution, and Gettysburg Address. The U.S. Mint unveiled the designs for coins commemorating the 250th anniversary of American independence next year. They depict the founding documents and the Revolutionary War, but so far, not President Donald Trump, despite a push among some of his allies to get his face on a coin.The Mint abandoned designs developed during Joe Biden’s presidency that highlighted women’s suffrage and civil rights advancements, favoring classical depictions of America over progress toward a more in...

item.title: Exclusive: Jerry Bruckheimer reacts to Quentin Tarantino naming Black Hawk Down the best movie of the 21st century
item.description: We spoke with producer Jerry Bruckheimer about Quentin Tarantino naming Black Hawk Down the best movie of the 21st century.

item.title: The best iPad deals this week include the iPad Air M3 for $150 off
item.description: We generally consider Apple’s iPads to be the best tablets for most people, but they usually don’t come cheap. To help those looking to grab one get the most value possible, we’re keeping an eye on sale prices and rounding up the best iPad deals we can find each week. This week’s highlights include both versions of the latest iPad Air for $150 off at Amazon, matching the all-time lows we last saw around Black Friday. The iPad mini and iPad Pro are each $100 off as well. Beyond iPads, both the AirPods Pro 3 and Apple Watch Series 11 are even cheaper than they were last month, and there are stil...

item.title: EU accused of ignoring warning signs in Broadcom's VMware acquisition

Selon les dernières études, il propose le meilleur réseau fibre, le meilleur Wi-Fi ainsi que le meilleur réseau mobile en zone urbaine. Ses offres valent-elles pour autant le coup ? Réponses ici.

item.title: Cannabis stocks surge on Trump’s rumored Schedule 3 marijuana change. How high can pot shares get?
item.description: If reclassified, pot would no longer be in the same category as heroin. Companies including Aurora and Tilray saw their shares jump by double digits. Multiple news reports this week said that President Trump is expected to reclassify marijuana’s drug scheduling, which would lessen restrictions on its use and potentially allow companies that operate in the cannabis space to increase business. ...

item.title: The best tech gifts and cool gadgets for 2025
item.description: Engadget staffers spend the entire year poking, prodding and otherwise testing the latest tech gadgets. So we’ve got a pretty good handle on what’s unique and interesting right now. We put together this list for anyone looking for a good gift for that tech-obsessed person on their gift list. Some of these are devices we’ve tested for our reviews and guides, others are items we bought for ourselves (or wish someone would buy for us). We’ve got more than 35 picks here, from nearly every member of the Engadget team. Chances are, you’ll find a good gift or two for every tech nerd you know. Here ar...

item.title: How Trump is blocking U.S. states from regulating artificial intelligence
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order that seeks to block states from creating guardrails for AI. President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday aimed at blocking states from crafting their own regulations for artificial intelligence, saying the burgeoning industry is at risk of being stifled by a patchwork of onerous rules while in a battle with Chinese competitors for supremacy.Members of Congress from both parties, as well as civil liberties and consumer rights groups, have pushed for more regulations on AI, saying there is not enough oversight for the powerful technology.But...

item.title: We’re still talking about the Trump phone
item.description: Every week at The Verge, we’re tracking what’s happening with Trump Mobile’s promised and yet undelivered Android phone. Why? Because we cover phones. We also cover vaporware, which the T1 Phone 8002 (gold version) very well may be. The smartphone has now been delayed for months. Trump Mobile no longer claims that it will be […]

item.title: Flaw in photo booth maker’s website exposes customers’ pictures
item.description: Hama Film makes photo booths that upload pictures and videos online. But their back-end systems have a simple flaw that allows anyone to download customer pictures.

item.title: Pourquoi cette voiture électrique chinoise précipite la fin de carrière d’une Renault vendue en France
item.description: Renault vient de retirer de son catalogue l'Arkana, un SUV coupé commercialisé en 2021. Une disparition prématurée qui n'est pas due aux ventes du modèle, mais aux bouleversements stratégiques du constructeur au losange à l'autre bout du monde et à une voiture électrique chinoise en particulier : la Polestar 4. Explications.

item.title: Vous l’attendiez depuis des années : la nouvelle app Frandroid corrige son plus gros défaut
item.description: Vous nous l'avez réclamé pendant des années dans les commentaires. On vous a écoutés. La toute nouvelle application Frandroid est disponible dès maintenant.
